CustomField.formula: IF(RecordTypeId = "0126000000010rU", "012600000009YRY", IF(RecordTypeId = "012600000000vSx", "012J0000000DAQK", IF(RecordTypeId = "012J0000000D9yG", "012J0000000DAQK", IF(RecordTypeId = "01260000000165R" && ISPICKVAL(Type,'Sponsor'), "012600000009YRY", IF(RecordTypeId = "01260000000165R" && ISPICKVAL(Type,'Engagement Partner'), "012600000009YRY", IF(RecordTypeId = "01260000000165R" && ISPICKVAL(Type,'Grant'), "012J0000000DAQK",null))))))
CustomField.label: Record Type ID formula
